channel.description:
Is it possible to edit the background in a 667 Loading 702 client , source? If yes , how do i do it?
EDIT: View of the client and cache http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wX-xz0yUp10&feature=youtu.be

item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

magemaniac33:

Post pictures of your cache file and your client files.

Okay i posted a video of my client and source

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @magemaniac33 magemaniac33
item.description:
@magemaniac33 wrote:

Post pictures of your cache file and your client files.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

magemaniac33:

Yes, yes you can just have A TON of fun getting other players to download your cache. How to: Go into cache files where ever it is located… Open it then open Sprites. There is a file called Background.png ; now go into login after you have replaced that with another .png SAME RESOLUTION. Now copy that into login and replace all the BG 0 - BG 6. You’re welcome. Upload your cache somewhere and update your cache client links in. CacheDownloader.java and CacheUpdater.java also Client.java Almost forgot MAYBE your signlink.java ; I recommend not touching that. If you get it to work can you pleaseeee give me your client, cache downloader, cacheupdater, also signlink.java I got stuck and my files won’t unpack like it should.

You’r method didn’t work and i still need help :S

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @magemaniac33 magemaniac33
item.description:
@magemaniac33 wrote:

Well I spent 15+ hours coding and finally got the problem to narrow down with unzipping the files that’s why I wanted to see your files. When I package my files exactly how the other downloads were and it unpackages, but mine doesn’t I don’t get why. That’s why I said have a ton of fun with it, because I can release my old client, but I don’t like it. The cache isn’t as up to date or anything with the server so people have trouble ; basically I deleted my cache and when it goes to downloads it, it will, but it will not unzip one of the files.

Also if you don't have sprites it may not have the background in there it depends on the type of server you have mine in a server was a 317 I believe and it was with all my other files starting with a K it was like klonng.png or something

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

magemaniac33:

Yes, yes you can just have A TON of fun getting other players to download your cache. How to: Go into cache files where ever it is located… Open it then open Sprites. There is a file called Background.png ; now go into login after you have replaced that with another .png SAME RESOLUTION. Now copy that into login and replace all the BG 0 - BG 6. You’re welcome. Upload your cache somewhere and update your cache client links in. CacheDownloader.java and CacheUpdater.java also Client.java Almost forgot MAYBE your signlink.java ; I recommend not touching that. If you get it to work can you pleaseeee give me your client, cache downloader, cacheupdater, also signlink.java I got stuck and my files won’t unpack like it should.

Okay , thank you.

EDIT:
What did you mean with

just have A TON of fun getting other players to download your cache.
?

Read full topic
